CustomField.formula: IF (DATEVALUE(LoginTime) >= DATE( YEAR (DATEVALUE(LoginTime)),03,31) - MOD(DATE ( YEAR (DATEVALUE(LoginTime)),03,31) - DATE (1900,1,7),7) && DATEVALUE(LoginTime) < DATE( YEAR (DATEVALUE(LoginTime)),10,31) - MOD(DATE ( YEAR (DATEVALUE(LoginTime)),10,31) - DATE (1900,1,7),7), LoginTime + (2/24), LoginTime + (1/24))
CustomField.label: Login GMT
